categories: Category:Star Wars Droids: The Kalarba Adventures

nodes.text: Star Wars Droids: The Kalarba Adventures 4 is the fourth issue of Star Wars Droids: The Kalarba Adventures, a Dark Horse comic book series starring R2-D2 and C-3PO. It was published in July 1994 by Dark Horse Comics

When Star Wars hit the big screen in 1977, the world fell in love with R2-D2 and       C-3PO. Now the events that led them to their fateful meeting with Luke Skywalker are revealed for the first time! In this issue, Corellian rogue Jace Forno leases the dysfunctional duo for a deadly mission to the moon Indobok!
